DOC.brief_summary: 1 . Specific Aims 1 . To evaluate effect life skills/parenting group embed within comprehensive multidisciplinary clinic adolescent parent ( Young Parents Program ) , use randomize control design . Specifically , effect group participation follow adolescent parent outcome investigate : - Parenting attitude skill include empathy , non-violent discipline , role appropriateness developmentally appropriate expectation . - Skills daily living , social relationship , work/study follow-up , measure Ansell-Casey Life Skills Assessment Scale . - Depression perceive social support use CESD-C Duke Social Support scale . - Repeat pregnancy rate 12 24 month first delivery . 2 . To evaluate overall Young Parents Program service delivery require Office Adolescent Pregnancy Programs ( project funder ) use cross cut evaluation health service utilization , social need work/educational outcome .
DOC.criteria: Must able speak read English Mothers must 18 baby bear Fathers must 25 baby bear Child must see YPP Willing complete computer survey 6 time 36 month Ability complete computer assist data collection If parent custody child If child longer receive care YPP
